DOC.detailed_description: Background : Lumbar spine disorder common condition pilot various aircraft etiology relate sub-optimal ergonomics , exposure G-forces , weight head gear exposure extensive vibration . Current treatment include physiotherapy chiropractic manipulation . Low-level laser irradiation ( LLLI ) non-ionizing , non-thermal irradiation within visible near infrared range light spectrum . LLLI use widely alleviation pain inflammatory process acceleration wound heal . A variety clinical study show LLLT near infrared range may useful treatment back pain . Objective : To evaluate efficacy Light Therapy treatment back pain pilot . Study design : Prospective , randomize , control double blind . Volunteers receive biweekly physiotherapy treatment 3 week . In addition physiotherapy treatment , half volunteer receive light therapy half sham irradiation . Study evaluation include physical examination orthopedic surgeon , subjective pain level visual analogue scale , validate low back functional questionnaire , generic functional questionnaire , patient satisfaction score . Volunteers invite evaluation 1 3 month final treatment .
